app_descript:
App Name: Nintendo Switch Online
Package Name: com.nintendo.znca

Brief

Nintendo Switch Online enhances your gaming experience on the Nintendo Switch console with a multitude of features, including voice chat during online play, access to game-specific services, and more. With a broader software range now supporting voice chat, players can communicate in various ways depending on the game, create rooms to chat with friends or split voice chat into teams for a competitive edge. The app also offers game-specific services for popular titles like Super Smash Bros.â„¢ Ultimate and Splatoonâ„¢ 2, providing valuable in-game information and the ability to interact with certain game elements directly from your smartphone.
